channel.title: CVE Feed for Melapress -- WP 2FA
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Melapress -- WP 2FA

item.title: CVE-2022-44595|2024-08-09T20:15:26.378Z -- melapress -- wp%202fa
item.description: Improper Authentication vulnerability in Melapress WP 2FA allows Authentication Bypass.This issue affects WP 2FA: from n/a through 2.2.0.

item.title: CVE-2024-32568|2024-08-02T02:13:40.070Z -- melapress -- wp%202fa
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Melapress WP 2FA allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects WP 2FA: from n/a through 2.6.2.
